com.communote.server.api.core.blog

Class BlogAccessException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.communote.server.api.core.security.AuthorizationException
          • com.communote.server.api.core.blog.BlogAccessException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class BlogAccessException
extends AuthorizationException
    Thrown if a user has not the required permission or role to access or modify a blog.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
